channel.title: audio fingerprinting on 3AM Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in audio fingerprinting on 3AM Engineering

item.title: Skip that intro!
item.description: If you ever binge-watched a series you should already be familiar with the urge to skip ASAP that intro/outro song. Many streaming services already have a skip intro button, but how does it work? Did you think that the content partners need to specify timestamps for intro/outros at the content ingest stage? That would be too easy. I attempted to automate the intro detection with chromaprint mostly for fun because it seems that was my definition of fun at the time.
